content: corner 2 half_double_crochet this will anchor the corners together with b windows for a neater look end 2 half_double_crochet in last window 25 single_crochet around the hanging loop and join to the first half_double_crochet with needle join and anchor to the white corner also this is my very first pattern please feel free to contact me if you find any mistakes or have suggestions for improvements e-mail lizza_dk@hotmail com i hope you enjoi making this i would love to see the final results if you post it on instagram then feel free to tage me @lizza_dk enjoy lis vinther olesen chain from hook dc1 ch1 sk1 x 24 double_crochet in last chain = 25 windows 1b chain 52 place chain on top of a-trellis on the 6th chain from the hook go through 2nd a-window and make double_crochet
